entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
